attributes.action: the mccann parents to receive legal hypnosis and be questioned about the whereabouts of their daughter
attributes.additional_details: Mr Gerry Mccann and Miss Kate Healy should receive legal hypnosis and then be questioned about the whereabouts of their daughter. This would resolve the inconsistencies in the witness statements taken from them and their companions regarding the circumstances surrounding the disappearance of Madeliene Mccann.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
